title: Queentoshi
author: Queentoshi
content: Have you heard of "The sports Bra", a bar dedicated to only showing women sports located somewhere in Portland, Oregon. The owner of this bar ''Jenny Nguyen'' say she felt the need to open this special bar after several visits to bars with her friends and noticing that they not show women sports on any of their screens. She also made mention of a general feeling among women who love to visit bars to watch sports.Quote it goes anywhere between ''uncomfortable to unsafe."This is a really unique idea as I think it can increase woman participation in sports if this idea is adopted by other business people who wish to start a sports bar in their different locations. More women will feel safer and more comfortable going to these bars themselves knowing that they will find more women than men there. What do you think about this?https://www.euronews.com/2022/08/22/sports-bra-a-unique-bar-dedicated-to-celebrating-womens-sports

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I saw this on the news, using the OP link:QuoteSince its opening, the bar has also become a local watering hole for the city’s LGBTQ+ community since Portland no longer has lesbian bars. As of 2022, there are less than 20 lesbian bars in the country.Is the bar only for lesbians? If not for only lesbians but general, it is really a good idea, it is true that only men sports are shown in bars, like in my country, only men football of the big leagues, most especially the EPL are shown, but which we always found interesting.But there are a lot of women in sport, but not as many as men though.

comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on August 23, 2022, 04:39:41 PMHave you heard of "The sports Bra", a bar dedicated to only showing women sports located somewhere in Portland, Oregon. The owner of this bar ''Jenny Nguyen'' say she felt the need to open this special bar after several visits to bars with her friends and noticing that they not show women sports on any of their screens. She also made mention of a general feeling among women who love to visit bars to watch sports.Well, other things apart but what does she thought while deciding the name as The sports Bra". Would it be more decent if the name was The Sports bar  They will show only women's matches? I think they could have shown both male and female matches but the entry in this bar should only for females. This way the females will have more opportunity to bet.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I like the wordplay between Bar and Bra. Of course, it's going to be a lady bar that probably has ladies' drinks all over, but it's a great idea to have that to show women empowerment and where they could feel safe with so many women around there. I hope more of these ideas will be applied to men-dominated things, businesses, and more. Quote from: Oshosondy on August 23, 2022, 04:50:57 PMIs the bar only for lesbians? I don't think it should be, though. But it will be awkward to visit there if you are just a single guy trying to meet someone there.
